import React, { Component } from 'react' import LayoutDashboard from '../../components/LayoutDashboard' import Link from 'next/link' import axios from 'axios' class CreatePost extends Component { state = { title: '', body: '', author: '', slug: '', category_name: '', created_at: '', updated_at: '' } postDataHandler = () => { const data = { title: this.state.title, body: this.state.body, author: this.state.author, slug: this.state.slug, category_name: this.state.category, created_at: this.state.create, updated_at: this.state.update } axios.post('https://my-json-server.typicode.com/wahyufaturrizky/dbwahyu/posts', data).then(response => { console.log(response); }); } render () { return ( {/* Main Content */}
